name: Steel Frost [Demo]
description:
This is a NSFW visual novel.  You have to be 18 or 20 years older to download this content.

Steel Frost is a story of a bleak sci-fi setting with bright characters, where Jeff, the Service Engineer gets a job at  J.A.C.K. warehouse during the season of snow storms. Jeff wasn't in a relationship for a long time. And all he hopes for, is quick money. Although it is possible, working in a giant cold steel container, will bring him the warmest memories of this winter.

During the game, click the mouse wheel button, or "H", to hide the text box.

-
